note: MyHikes.org is an independently-owned web platform for hikers and backpackers to share their trips by uploading GPX files from their favorite apps or tracking devices. MyHikes is 100% free and open to the public to submit hikes to help everyone find trails easier. With or without an account, users can get directions to the trailhead, use elevation charts to plan their hikes, and browse pictures from the trail to know what to expect before heading out.
